name: THE LITTLE BOY: QUEI
description:
Embark on an epic journey as Quei, a young boy born in the palace with the noble purpose to protect the princess as her bodyguard. Despite his predetermined fate, Quei embraces his role with joy, grateful for each moment spent with the princess. But this is just the beginning, the story is not just about Quei. During the game, there will be more and more content that does not belong to this world, and these things are gradually eroding the inner world of the protagonist. Through this story, you will uncover hidden truths and unravel the mysteries that lie within where the line between reality and fantasy is blurred.

Credits Design

Wenhao Zhu

Art

Programming
